(OOC: I agree with Yanshosh and Logomorph, teleporting should be limited, and 
it should consume lots of energy.)


::Magmatron::

    He saw the eyebrow raise on Shredder, he knew that he would be 
questioning Magmatron's sanity. He then picked up the bug and walked over to 
Shredder.
    "A Predacon named Phobia has released hundreds of bugs into our base," 
Magmatron stated. Then his hand began to glow. This bug was now able to 
infect the others with the same virus that would allow Magmatron to know what 
was going on inside Phobia's ship. "There, all better."
